forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. West southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As night descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a chill that hints at the seasonal shift. The sky, a canvas of muted grays and deep blues, mirrors the promise of a calm yet somewhat brisk evening. A gentle breeze whispers through the trees, urging those who venture out to wrap themselves in warm layers, a comfortable sweater or a light jacket complementing the coolness that settles around 46 degrees. The city’s glow sparkles, drawing you into its embrace, even as the evening sea fog lingers at the periphery, softening the outlines of the skyline.

Tomorrow hints at the return of sun-kissed rays, though with modest highs near 55 that gradually retreat as afternoon slips into evening. The atmosphere will remain lively yet subdued as cloud cover drifts sporadically, perhaps inviting those who savor the quiet to explore the nooks of local cafés or wander through the illuminated streets adorned with the soft hum of urban life at dusk. Choose your path wisely—strolling along the waterfront or finding solace in nondescript bookshops might offer moments of introspection on this pleasant yet slightly brisk day.
